entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
